text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump According to a local EMT, we don’t have any tests here in Far West TX. Symptomatic pts are tested for everything else. If they test negative for all else, COVID19 is assumed & they’re transported to Odessa. We’re flying blind out here. Why are we shut down if it’s all guesswork??
